meanings.definition: Make a low, guttural sound of pain or discomfort.
meanings.sent1: The injured dog groans softly as it tries to stand up.
meanings.sent2: She groans in pain as she stubs her toe on the table.
meanings.sent3: After a long day of work, he groans dramatically when he finally sits down.
meanings.sent4: The old floorboards groan under the weight of the heavy furniture.
meanings.sent5: The wind groans through the trees on a stormy night.

meanings.sent1: She groans about having to do her homework on a Friday night.
meanings.sent2: He always groans about having to wake up early for work.
meanings.sent3: The child groans playfully when asked to eat their vegetables.
meanings.sent4: The engine groans as the car struggles to climb the steep hill.
meanings.sent5: The students groan in unison when the teacher announces a pop quiz.
